metadata.title: CVE-2021-46985 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ACPI: scan: Fix a memory leak in an error handling pathIf 'acpi_device_set_name()' fails, we must free'acpi_device_bus_id->bus_id' or there is a (potential) memory leak.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
